content.rendered:
Directed by Lisa Soper. Roxanne Benjamin. Cierra Glaude. Megan Griffiths. Maggie Kiley. Alex Pillai.

Written by Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa. Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa. Katie Avery. Katie Avery. Lindsay Calhoon Bring. Lindsay Calhoon Bring. Alexis Scheer. Alexis Scheer. Sara Shepard. Evelyn Yves. Evelyn Yves. Michael Grassi. Stasia Demick. Pamela Garcia Rooney. Danielle Iman. Eleanor Jean. Jenina Kibuka.

Cast Bailee Madison (Imogen Adams 1). Chandler Kinney (Tabitha ‘Tabby’ Haworthe 1). Zaria (Faran Bryant 1). Malia Pyles (Minnie ‘Mouse’ Honrada 1). Maia Reficco (Noa Olivar 1). Mallory Bechtel (Kelly Beasley 1). Alex Aiono (Shawn Noble 1). Elias Kacavas (Greg 1). Carson Rowland (Chip Langsberry 1). Travis Patton (Archie). Eric Johnson (Sheriff Beasley). Kate Jennings Grant (Madame Giry). Ben Cook (Henry). Sharon Leal (Sidney Hayworthe). Elena Goode (Marjorie Olivar). Lea Salonga (Elodie Honrada). Emily Bautista (Teen Elodie). Ava DeMary (Teen Davie). Derek Klena (Wes). Gabriella Pizzolo (Angela Waters). Zakiya Young (Corey Bryant). Carly Pope (Davie Adams). Sarah-Anne Martinez (Teen Marjorie). Kim Berrios Lin (Shirley). Kristen Maxwell (Teen Sidney). Kristian Mosley (Teen Corey). Robert Stanton (Principal Marshall Clanton). Jeffrey Bean (Mr. Smithee). Jennifer Ferrin (Martha Beasley). Benton Greene (Zeke Bryant). Barbara Tirrell (Mrs. Murray). Alexander Chaplin (Steve Bowers). Cristala Carter (Nurse Simmons).

Language English.

Producers Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa. Caroline Baron. Lindsay Calhoon Bring. Sean Garrett Fogel. Pamela Garcia Rooney. Jimmy Gibbons. Gina Girolamo. Michael Grassi. Danielle Iman. Eleanor Jean. Jenina Kibuka. I. Marlene King. Leslie Morgenstein. Amy Myrold. Lisa Soper. Annie Rader.

Production Alloy Entertainment. Muckle Man Productions. Warner Bros. Television.

Creators Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa. Lindsay Calhoon Bring.

No. of Seasons 2

No. of Episodes 11

Status Finished (6)
